hh_received_snap_cnt.long_description: The number of households in which at least one member of the household received benefits from the Food Stamp Program or the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) in the past 12 months.  This does not include households in which at least one member recieved benefits from WIC, the School Lunch Program, or assistance from food banks and not also from the Food Stamp Program or SNAP in the past 12 months.
hh_received_snap_cnt.long_name: Count of Households That Received Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)
hh_received_snap_cnt.short_description: The number of households in which at least one member received benefits from the Food Stamp Program or SNAP in the past 12 months
hh_received_snap_cnt.short_name: Count of Households That Received SNAP
hh_received_snap_cnt.statement: The count of households that received SNAP in {features.name} is {value}.

hh_received_snap_pct.long_description: The percentage of households in which at least one member of the household received benefits from the Food Stamp Program or the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) in the past 12 months.  This does not include households in which at least one member recieved benefits from WIC, the School Lunch Program, or assistance from food banks and not also from the Food Stamp Program or SNAP in the past 12 months.
hh_received_snap_pct.long_name: Percentage of Households That Received Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)
hh_received_snap_pct.short_description: The percentage of households in which at least one member received benefits from the Food Stamp Program or SNAP in the past 12 months
hh_received_snap_pct.short_name: Percentage of Households That Received SNAP
hh_received_snap_pct.statement: The percentage of households that received SNAP in {features.name} is {value}.

population.statement: The number of households in {features.name} is {value}.
